snippet: Atlanta pitcher Julio Teheran allowed six home runs in just two innings and the Detroit Tigers connected nine times over all in routing the Braves, 18-3, in Lakeland, Fla.
abstract: Detroit Tigers defeat Atlanta Braves, 18-3, in spring training exhibition, as Braves pitcher Julio Teheran allows six home runs in just two innings.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta pitcher Julio Teheran allowed six home runs in just two innings and the Detroit Tigers connected nine times over all in routing the Braves, 18-3, in Lakeland, Fla.
